alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 03 at 8:04PM CDT until August 06 at 10:27PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... St. Francis River near Patterson affecting Wayne County. For the St. Francis River...including Patterson, Fisk...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St. Francis River near Patterson. * WHEN...From Friday morning to late Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 24.5 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
